price: शायद हम इन जादूगरों के अनुयायी बन जाएँ, यदि वही विजयी हों।
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
